remarks: Convert a group operation to a group structure.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grp2grp.a $e |- ( Base ` K ) = ran .+ $.
grp2grp.p $e |- ( +g ` K ) = .+ $.
grp2grp.g $e |- .+ e. GrpOp $.
grpo2grp $p |- K e. Grp $.
